name: author_bot
description: True if the given author is identified as a bot.

name: author_domain
description: Domain associated to the author in SortingHat profile.

name: author_gender
description: Author gender, based on her name (disabled by default).

name: author_gender_acc
description: Author gender accuracy (disabled by default).

name: author_id
description: Author ID from SortingHat.

name: author_login
description: Author's login name from GitLab.

name: author_multi_org_names
description: List of the author organizations from SortingHat profile.

name: author_name
description: Author name.

name: author_org_name
description: Author organization name.

name: author_user_name
description: Author user name from SortingHat.

name: author_uuid
description: Author UUID from SortingHat.

name: body
description: Body of the merge request/comment.

name: body_analyzed
description: Body of the merge request/comment.

name: code_merge_duration
description: Difference in days between creation and merging dates.

name: comment_updated_at
description: Date when the comment was updated.

name: gitlab_repo
description: The name of the GitLab repository.

name: grimoire_creation_date
description: Merge request/comment creation date.

name: id
description: Merge request/comment ID.

name: is_gitlab_comment
description: Used to unify merge request and merge request comments.

name: is_gitlab_merge_comment
description: Used to separate merge requests from comments.

name: is_gitlab_merge_request
description: Used to separate merge requests from issues.

name: item_type
description: The type of the item (merge request/comment).

name: merge_author_login
description: Merge author login from GitLab.

name: merge_author_name
description: Merge author name from GitLab.

name: merge_closed_at
description: Date in which the merge request was closed.

name: merge_created_at
description: Date in which the merge request was closed.

name: merge_id
description: Merge request ID in the GitLab repository.

name: merge_id_in_repo
description: The merge request's ID in the repository.

name: merge_labels
description: The labels assigned to an merge request.

name: merge_merged_at
description: Date when the merge request was merged.

name: merge_state
description: State of the merge request (open/closed/merged).

name: merge_status
description: State of the merge request (can_be_merged/can_be_closed).

name: merge_title
description: The title of the merge request.

name: merge_title_analyzed
description: Merge request title split by terms to allow searching.

name: merge_updated_at
description: Date when the merge request was last updated.

name: merge_url
description: Full URL of the merge request.

name: merged_by_bot
description: True if the merge author is identified as a bot, from SortingHat profile.

name: merged_by_domain
description: Domain associated to the merge author in SortingHat profile.

name: merged_by_gender
description: Merge author gender, based on her name (disabled by default).

name: merged_by_gender_acc
description: Merge author gender accuracy (disabled by default).

name: merged_by_id
description: Merge author ID from SortingHat.

name: merged_by_multi_org_names
description: List of the merge author organizations from SortingHat profile.

name: merged_by_name
description: Merge author name.

name: merged_by_org_name
description: Merge author organization name.

name: merged_by_user_name
description: Merge author user name from SortingHat.

name: merged_by_uuid
description: Merge author UUID from SortingHat.

name: metadata__enriched_on
description: Date when the data were enriched.

name: metadata__gelk_backend_name
description: Name of the backend used to enrich the data.

name: metadata__gelk_version
description: Version of the backend used to enrich the data.

name: metadata__timestamp
description: Date when the item was stored in ElasticSearch raw index.

name: metadata__updated_on
description: Date when the item was updated on its original data source.

name: num_merge_comments
description: Number of merge request comments.

name: num_versions
description: Number of versions

name: origin
description: The original URL from which the repository was retrieved from.

name: project
description: Project name.

name: project_1
description: Used if more than one project levels are allowed in the project hierarchy.

name: reactions.count
description: Number of reactions of a given type.

name: reactions.type
description: Name of reaction to comment/issue.

name: reactions_total_count
description: Total number of reactions to comment/issue.

name: repository
description: Repository name.

name: sub_type
description: Type of the comment (merge request comment).

name: tag
description: Perceval tag.

name: time_open_days
description: Time the item is open counted in days.

name: time_to_close_days
description: Time to close a merge request counted in days.

name: time_to_merge_request_response
description: Time to merge a merge request counted in days.

name: title_analyzed
description: Issue title split by by terms to allow searching.

name: url
description: Url of the merge request/comment.

name: uuid
description: Perceval UUID.
